actions.description: The balor makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its whip.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) lightning damage. If the balor scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward the balor.
actions.name: Whip

actions.description: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
actions.name: Teleport

damage_resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
name: Balor

traits.description: When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 (20d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the balor's weapons.
traits.name: Death Throes

traits.description: At the start of each of the balor's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the balor or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) fire damage.
traits.name: Fire Aura

traits.description: The balor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.description: The balor's weapon attacks are magical.
traits.name: Magic Weapons
